name: Milk Chocolate Cookies with Ginger and Toffee
description: Baked for the 2010 Serious Eats Cookie Swap by Eat for Eight Bucks columnists Cara Eisenpress and Phoebe Lapine...
recipeIngredient: ½ cup coarsely chopped crystallized ginger

recipeInstructions.text: Mix sugars and butter in large bowl until cream. Add egg, espresso powder, and vanilla extract, and mix until even creamier. Stir in flour, baking soda, and salt and mix until just combined. Stir in ginger, toffee, and chocolate.
Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls about 2 inches apart onto parchment-lined cookie sheet. Bake until just golden, 6-8 minutes. Cool slightly; remove from cookie sheet and let cool completely.
